item.description:
Tonight at Improv Boston and on the first Thursday of every month at 10pm I will be hosting A Night of Oral (tradition) a themed storytelling show with local performers and storytellers telling funny stories. It runs about an hour and some. There are 4-6 performers telling 5-8 minute stories.

I also suggest this:
Stripped Stories on March 19th at 8pm
At Mottley's Comedy Club
http://www.mottleysco...
http://www.strippedst...
This show is awesome and fun though a little racy. Be forewarned.

I also suggest this: (it's at 8, see this show and then come see my show. Crazy story packed night!)
Mortified
TIME: 8:00 PM
VENUE: Mottleys Comedy Club @ Trinity
ADDRESS: 61 Chatham Street, 02109
This show is awesome, see it anytime you can.

Brother Blue
Brother Blue and his wife Ruth host open mic storytelling every Tuesday night in Sherrill Hall of the Harvard Episcopal Divinity School, 99 Brattle Street, Cambridge, at 7:00 PM.
You can also see him sometimes on CCTV.

These are all great shows to check out!

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: Tonight and other Suggestions!
